price:
E que não podem oferecer-lhes socorro nem socorrer-se a si
mesmos.
arabic: وَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ لَهُمۡ نَصۡرٗا وَلَآ أَنفُسَهُمۡ يَنصُرُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: walā yastaṭīʿūna lahum naṣran walā anfusahum yanṣurūna
